application.name: truncfield
application.description: truncates specified fields from a string-delimited data stream

option.name: fields
option.description: list of fields to be truncated

option.name: output_fname
option.description: name of file to which output should be written

option.name: append_fname
option.description: name of file to which output should be appended

details.item: if -d is not specified and DELIMITER enviroment variable is defined, that value will be used.
